r.d:
bcompiler enables you to encode your scripts in phpbytecode, enabling you to protect the source code. bcompiler could be used in the following situations
- to create a exe file of a PHP-GTK application (in conjunction with other software) - to create closed source libraries - to provide clients with time expired software (prior to payment) - to deliver close source applications - for use on embedded systems, where disk space is a priority.
For install instructions see the manual at pear.php.net
